artist: Painter: After Lucio Massari; Designer: Francesco Rosaspina; Engraver: Gaetano Guadagnini

inscription:

below image in black: Luacio Massari dip.  F. Rosaspina dis.  G. Guadognini inc./ GESU CHRISTO DEPOSTO DELLA CROCE | in pencil on sheet: 2-30
title: Jesus Christ Taken Down From The Cross
